sentences.sContent: I had to do it, because insurrection must have its discipline.
sentences.sContent_eng: I had to do it, because insurrection must have its discipline.
sentences.sCn: 我应当这样做，因为起义应当有它的纪律。

sentences.sContent: The necessary tactics of insurrection are to drown small numbers in a vast obscurity, to multiply every combatant by the possibilities, which that obscurity contains.
sentences.sContent_eng: The necessary tactics of insurrection are to drown small numbers in a vast obscurity, to multiply every combatant by the possibilities, which that obscurity contains.
sentences.sCn: 把一小部分淹没在广大的黑暗中，用这黑暗所创造的条件来加强每个战士的战斗力，这是起义必要的战略。

remMethod.val: in(反) + surrect(升起) + ion → 反对活动出现 → 造反

trans.tranOther: an attempt by a large group of people within a country to take control using force and violence
